title: 5 colours of France = Five colours of France
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: 1. An open zoo 25 miles east of Paris. 2. Sculpture exhibition at la Place des Vosges. 3. The festival of theatre arts in the Marais district of Paris. 4. “Commissioner San Antonio” - a new thriller being filmed.
